lines.gurmukhi: jYsy lg mwqHIn pVq Aaur kau Aaur ipqw pUq pUq ipqw smsir jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Lag Maatraheen Parhat Aur Kau Aura , Pitaa Poot Poot Pitaa Samasari Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a word devoid of vowel symbol would sound different, word 'pita' and 'putt' would be read alike.

lines.gurmukhi: suriq ibhUn jYsy bwvro bKwnIAq Aaur khy Aaur kCy ihrdY mY AwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Surati Bihoon Jaisay Baavaro Bakhaaneeata , Aur Kahay Aur Kachhay Hiradai Mai Aaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a person is called demented when not in his full senses, he understands different than what is being said.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy guMg sBw miD kih n skq bwq bolq hswie hoie bcn ibDwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Goung Sabhaa Madhi Kahi N Sakat Baata , Bolat Hasaai Hoi Bachan Bidhaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a mute person cannot express himself in any gathering, even if he tries to utter a word, he becomes a laughing stock for all,

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mwrg mY mnmuK Qkq huie lgn sgn mwny kYsy mwnIAY ]264]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Maarag Mai Manamoukh Dakat Hui , Lagan Sagan Maanay Kaisay Maaneeai ?264?

Shabad OS B.translation: No self-oriented or self-willed person can tread the path of Guru-conscious persons. How can one feel persuaded to tread the path of Guru-conscious people when one is bound by the omens-good or bad. (264)
